about_the_game:
This world is filled with many mysterious monuments. Our mission is to activate these monuments and destroy them. Each monument represents a different challenge, and whenever a monument is activated, powerful monsters are summoned. Only by continuously exploring can we overcome these formidable creatures!

Original Skill System



During upgrades, you can choose one skill from three random options and convert it into an active attack skill or a passive effect. Please note that for each skill, you can only choose between active and passive skills, providing players with more strategic choices.

School Construction, Random Growth



Upgrades feature random talent abilities and skills for players to choose, with a system allowing selection between active and passive attack skills. Each player's character will possess unique characteristics.


Players can choose to focus on upgrading a single skill, but there is no guarantee that they will be able to select that skill every time. Alternatively, they can create a diverse school-style. In addition, through the village's master craftsmen, players have the opportunity to reset skills and readjust their character's ability configuration.

Brand new modes and maps




Players need to activate and destroy the monuments, which will awaken troublesome monsters. Only after defeating the monuments throughout the land will players have the opportunity to challenge mysterious bosses. Players can manufacture and trade equipment in the village, as well as reset skills and abilities. Only through continuous exploration can players overcome the current challenges and defeat these tricky monsters!


There is still more game content waiting for you to discover.
detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD SERVER!


About the Game


This world is filled with many mysterious monuments. Our mission is to activate these monuments and destroy them. Each monument represents a different challenge, and whenever a monument is activated, powerful monsters are summoned. Only by continuously exploring can we overcome these formidable creatures!

Original Skill System



During upgrades, you can choose one skill from three random options and convert it into an active attack skill or a passive effect. Please note that for each skill, you can only choose between active and passive skills, providing players with more strategic choices.

School Construction, Random Growth



Upgrades feature random talent abilities and skills for players to choose, with a system allowing selection between active and passive attack skills. Each player's character will possess unique characteristics.


Players can choose to focus on upgrading a single skill, but there is no guarantee that they will be able to select that skill every time. Alternatively, they can create a diverse school-style. In addition, through the village's master craftsmen, players have the opportunity to reset skills and readjust their character's ability configuration.

Brand new modes and maps




Players need to activate and destroy the monuments, which will awaken troublesome monsters. Only after defeating the monuments throughout the land will players have the opportunity to challenge mysterious bosses. Players can manufacture and trade equipment in the village, as well as reset skills and abilities. Only through continuous exploration can players overcome the current challenges and defeat these tricky monsters!


There is still more game content waiting for you to discover.
name: Faction Z

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel i5 6600K / Ryzen 3 1300
  • Graphics: RX 580 / GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64

short_description: In a world of mysterious monuments, our mission is to activate and destroy them. Each one presents a unique challenge, summoning powerful monsters. Conquer these creatures through exploration!
supported_languages: Traditional Chinese, English, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean
